toolSpec.name: market_structure_tool
toolSpec.description: Analyzes market structure fundamentals: support/resistance levels, trend analysis, technical indicators (RSI, MACD, moving averages), price patterns, and market bias determination. Best for structural analysis, trend identification, and technical pattern recognition.

toolSpec.name: equity_order_flow_tool
toolSpec.description: Provides live equity order flow: current market conditions, buying/selling pressure, institutional vs retail activity, volume imbalances, and recent trading patterns. Essential for answering 'what does the market look like now', 'current market state', 'buying or selling pressure', and 'institutional activity'.

toolSpec.name: options_order_flow_tool
toolSpec.description: Delivers live options order flow: current options sentiment, PUT/CALL ratio, options positioning, directional bias from options activity. Essential for 'options sentiment', 'market overview', 'options activity', 'put call ratio', 'options positioning', and 'what does options flow show'.

toolSpec.name: options_monitoring_tool
toolSpec.description: Configures automated monitoring and alerting systems for specific option strike prices. Creates ongoing surveillance of particular strike ranges with notifications when unusual activity occurs. Used for setting up watchlists and automated alerts on specific strikes.

strike_range.description: Array of strike prices to monitor

include_both_types.description: Whether to monitor both PUT and CALL types

toolSpec.name: greeks_tool_v2
toolSpec.description: INITIATES options Greeks data collection system for delta, gamma, theta, vega calculations across strike ranges. This tool STARTS mathematical risk metrics analysis and must be used BEFORE retrieving Greeks data. Used for advanced options risk management and mathematical Greeks calculations.

range.description: Number of strikes to include above and below ATM

toolSpec.name: greeks_metrics_tool
toolSpec.description: RETRIEVES mathematical Greeks metrics (delta, gamma, theta, vega) from previously initiated data collection. Provides aggregated risk metrics, volatility skew analysis, and mathematical options positioning calculations. Requires prior initialization with greeks_tool_v2.

toolSpec.name: financial_volume_profile
toolSpec.description: Retrieves Volume Profile structure (POC, VAH, VAL, Nodes) for default granular timeframes (1m, 5m). Useful for identifying key support and resistance levels based on volume distribution.

symbol.description: The stock ticker symbol (e.g., SPY, AAPL).

toolSpec.name: financial_technical_analysis
toolSpec.description: Provides real-time technical indicators: RSI, MACD, moving averages, ATR, VWAP showing current momentum, trend direction, and market conditions. Essential for 'market overview', 'current market state', 'technical analysis', 'momentum', and 'trend direction'.

symbol.description: The stock ticker symbol (e.g., SPY, AAPL).

toolSpec.name: financial_technical_zones
toolSpec.description: Calculates precise entry/exit zones: high-probability support and resistance levels derived from volume profile and volatility analysis. Best for 'entry levels', 'exit points', 'stop loss levels', 'support resistance zones', and 'trading levels'.

symbol.description: The stock ticker symbol (e.g., SPY, AAPL).

toolSpec.name: memory_context_tool
toolSpec.description: Retrieves conversation history and previous analysis from memory storage. Essential for 'status check', 'is recommendation still valid', 'previous analysis', 'what did we discuss', and 'check my recommendation'.

toolSpec.name: memory_recommendation_tool
toolSpec.description: Retrieves previous recommendations and their original thesis from memory storage. Use when users ask about validation, status checks, or references to 'my recommendation' or previous analysis.
